animals.name: Pangolin
animals.description: Pangolins are sometimes mistaken as reptiles, but they are actually scaly-skinned mammals.

animals.name: Mantis Shrimp
animals.description: Mantis shrimp, or stomatopods, are carnivorous marine crustaceans of the order Stomatopoda Stomatopods.

animals.name: Gibbon
animals.description: Any of approximately 20 species of small apes found in the tropical forests of Southeast Asia.

animals.name: Wombat
animals.description: Wombats are short-legged, muscular quadrupedal marsupials that are native to Australia.
